description:
Create a list of exterior constructions that can be used to edit or create a
ConstructionSet object.
-

outputs.name: exterior_set
outputs.description:
A list of exterior constructions that can be used to edit
or create a ConstructionSet object.

name: HB Exterior Construction Subset

inputs.name: _exterior_wall_
inputs.description:
A construction object for exterior walls (or text for
the identifier of the construction within the library).

inputs.name: _exterior_roof_
inputs.description:
A construction object for exterior roofs (or text for
the identifier of the construction within the library).

inputs.name: _exposed_floor_
inputs.description:
A construction object for exposed floors (or text for
the identifier of the construction within the library).
